flavor: Volcanic Drakes breathe lava instead of fire. The antacid vendor at Thorium Point does a brisk business with them.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
name: Volcanic Drake
howToGet: Unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
text: Costs (1) less for each minion that died this turn.
